channel.title: Version 5.0 :: Hugo Relearn Theme
channel.description: 5.0.0 (2022-07-05) Breaking Breaking The theme changed how JavaScript and CSS dependencies are loaded to provide a better performance. In case youâ€™ve added own JavaScript code that depends on the themes jQuery implementation, you have to put it into a separate *.js file (if not already) and add the defer keyword to the script element. Eg.
